availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Cinderella Pugh. Father of Frances S. Pugh, Moses H. Pugh, Henry C. Pugh, James N. Pugh, Thomas E. Pugh, Mary A. Pugh, and Elijah Pugh. Engaged in agriculture in Greenup County, Kentucky, in 1840. Farmer in Greenup County in 1850. Farmer in Greenup County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Sixth Manuscript Census of the United States (1840), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, p. 223.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, District 1, p. 231B.

Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, Precinct 1, p. 9A.
